title: Casino Royale
description: Daniel Craig makes his debut as the newly minted agent 007, who's pitted against an infamous financier of global terrorism -- at the poker table.
starring: Daniel Craig, Judi Dench, Eva Green

title: Quantum of Solace
description: Picking up an hour after the events of 2006's Casino Royale, this James Bond adventure finds 007 tracking a traitor who's infiltrated Britain's MI6.
starring: Daniel Craig, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Amalric

title: Charlie's Angels
description: A tight-knit trio of specially trained agents wield weapons — and charm — as they track down stolen software in this reboot of the classic TV series.
starring: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu

title: Due Date
description: Days before his pregnant wife's due date, Peter lands on the "no-fly" list, forcing him to drive across the country with an irritating slacker.
starring: Robert Downey Jr., Zach Galifianakis, Michelle Monaghan

title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
description: In this reboot of the TV classic, the Angels are tasked with finding lost rings encoded with the personal information of people in witness protection.
starring: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu

title: Adrift
description: A young couple’s sailing adventure becomes a fight to survive when their yacht faces a catastrophic hurricane in this story based on true events.
starring: Shailene Woodley, Sam Claflin, Jeffrey Thomas

title: Midnight Special
description: When his son exhibits supernatural powers, a father takes the youngster on the run to protect him from government authorities and religious fanatics.
starring: Michael Shannon, Joel Edgerton, Kirsten Dunst

title: Anaconda
description: A documentary film crew on a boat in the Amazon picks up a mysterious stranger who dupes them into pursuing a monstrous and deadly 40-foot-long snake.
starring: Jennifer Lopez, Ice Cube, Jon Voight

title: Set It Off
description: Fed up with their circumstances, four close friends see a way out through bank robbery until the thrills of their heists attract an obsessive detective.
starring: Queen Latifah, Jada Pinkett Smith, Vivica A. Fox

title: Pineapple Express
description: After witnessing a murder, a perpetually stoned process server and his good-natured dealer go on the run from a drug lord who's out to kill them.
starring: Seth Rogen, James Franco, Danny McBride

title: The Debt Collector 2
description: French and Sue have two days to collect on three debts, using as much force as it takes – all while evading the wrath of a crime lord out for revenge.
starring: Scott Adkins, Louis Mandylor, Vladimir Kulich

title: Santana
description: Two brothers — one a narcotics agent and the other a general — finally discover the identity of the drug lord who murdered their parents decades ago.
starring: Paulo Americano, Raul Rosario, Rapulana Seiphemo

title: Fate/Grand Order -First Order-
description: Discovering that humanity is facing extinction, a new recruit to the Chaldea Security Organization goes back in time in order to save the future.
starring: Nobunaga Shimazaki, Rie Takahashi, Ayako Kawasumi

title: Children of the Sea
description: Ruka spends her summer at the aquarium, where she’s drawn into an enigmatic aquatic event alongside two mysterious boys raised in the ocean.
starring: Mana Ashida, Hiiro Ishibashi, Seishu Uragami

title: Barbershop
description: A barber sells the Chicago shop he inherited from his father, then quickly regrets his decision — but getting back his birthright won't be so easy.
starring: Ice Cube, Anthony Anderson, Cedric the Entertainer

title: Cuties
description: Eleven-year-old Amy starts to rebel against her conservative family’s traditions when she becomes fascinated with a free-spirited dance crew.
starring: Fathia Youssouf, Médina El Aidi-Azouni, Esther Gohourou

title: Bookmarks
description: Celebrity readers share children's books by Black authors to spark kid-friendly conversations about empathy, equality, self-love and antiracism.
starring: Marley Dias

title: Menace II Society
description: In Watts, a shootout triggers a series of events that leave high school grad Caine caught between surviving in the streets and surviving for good.
starring: Tyrin Turner, Samuel L. Jackson, Larenz Tate

title: Sister, Sister
description: Separated at birth, twin sisters Tia Landry and Tamera Campbell reunite after 14 years and soon move in together, blending families and personalities.
starring: Tia Mowry-Hardrict, Tamera Mowry-Housley, Jackée Harry

title: Glory
description: During the Civil War, the first all-African American regiment engages in an uphill attack against the Confederate army amid bigotry, bloodshed and more.
starring: Matthew Broderick, Denzel Washington, Morgan Freeman

title: The Muppets
description: When the Muppets learn that their beloved theater is slated for demolition, the gang reunite to raise the $10 million they need to save it.
starring: Jason Segel, Amy Adams, Chris Cooper

title: The Smurfs
description: When evil Gargamel tries to capture them, the Smurfs flee their woodland home, pass through a magic portal and find themselves stranded in New York.
starring: Hank Azaria, Neil Patrick Harris, Jayma Mays

title: Zathura
description: A mysterious game sends two brothers flying into space, where they must reach the planet Zathura — or be trapped in galactic limbo forever.
starring: Jonah Bobo, Josh Hutcherson, Dax Shepard

title: Puss in Boots
description: The fabled feline heads to the Land of Giants with friends Humpty Dumpty and Kitty Softpaws on a quest to nab its greatest treasure: the Golden Goose.
starring: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Zach Galifianakis

title: Muppets Most Wanted
description: In the middle of their global tour, the Muppets inadvertently get mixed up in a perilous drama involving a gang of international jewel thieves.
starring: Ricky Gervais, Ty Burrell, Tina Fey

title: The Dark Crystal
description: In this mythical tale, Jen, the last of the Gelfling race, is charged with healing the Crystal of Truth after its mutilation sets off an era of terror.
starring: Jim Henson, Kathryn Mullen, Frank Oz

title: Hotel for Dogs
description: Placed in a foster home that doesn't allow pets, 16-year-old Andi and her younger brother Bruce turn an abandoned hotel into a home for their dog.
starring: Emma Roberts, Jake T. Austin, Kyla Pratt

title: The Boss Baby: Get That Baby!
description: Think you've got what it takes to be the boss? This interactive special puts your skills to the test and matches you up with one of 16 jobs at Baby Corp.
starring: JP Karliak, Pierce Gagnon, Alex Cazares

title: A Princess for Christmas
description: At the invitation of a relative, young Jules Daly travels with her niece and nephew to a castle in Europe, where Jules falls for a dashing prince.
starring: Katie McGrath, Sir Roger Moore, Sam Heughan

title: Barbie Princess Adventure
description: With new friends in a new kingdom, Barbie learns what it means to be herself when she trades places with a royal lookalike in this musical adventure.
starring: America Young, Erica Lindbeck, Ritesh Rajan

title: True: Friendship Day
description: When a giant Grippity-Grab snags Grizelda’s friendship bracelet and turns her into a mermaid, True heads under the sea with magic wishes to save the day.
starring: Michela Luci, Jamie Watson, Eric Peterson

title: Dhh
description: Convinced only a miracle can save them from failing school exams, a trio of friends seek help from a magician. To their surprise, he gamely complies.
starring: Naseeruddin Shah, Kahaan, Kuldeep Sodha

title: Thomas & Friends: Thomas and the Royal Engine
description: An invitation from the Queen sends Thomas and the crew to London as they weave through delays and debacles while racing to a royal celebration.
starring: Rosamund Pike, Joseph May, Sharon Miller

title: LeapFrog: Letter Factory
description: In this entertaining installment of the wildly popular early-learning series, Professor Quigley, Leap, Lily and Tad arrive at the magical Letter Factory, where jumbles of sounds are miraculously shaped into letters.
starring: Joey Camen, Marie Danielle, Mark Cacciatore

title: Get Organized with The Home Edit
description: Expert home organizers Clea and Joanna help celebrities and everyday clients edit, categorize and contain their clutter to create stunning spaces.

title: Grease
description: Teen lovebirds-turned-classmates Sandy and Danny struggle to juggle lingering feelings, new friendships and more in this iconic ensemble movie-musical.
starring: John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing

title: The Producers
description: A has-been Broadway producer and a timid accountant scheme to raise money for a play that's sure to be a flop so they can then pocket the extra cash.
starring: Nathan Lane, Matthew Broderick, Uma Thurman

title: Coneheads
description: An odd alien family with cone-shaped heads, robotlike walks and an appetite for toilet paper tries to blend into a New Jersey neighborhood.
starring: Dan Aykroyd, Jane Curtin, Michael McKean

title: Love, Guaranteed
description: Sparks fly when a crusading but cash-strapped attorney takes on a charming client looking to sue a dating site that guarantees its users will find love.
starring: Rachael Leigh Cook, Damon Wayans Jr., Heather Graham

title: My Best Friend's Wedding
description: When she learns her platonic pal is getting married, food critic Julianne Potter realizes her true feelings for him and tries to sabotage the wedding.
starring: Julia Roberts, Dermot Mulroney, Cameron Diaz

title: Morning Glory
description: A whiz-kid producer finds her abilities put to the test when she's charged with bringing a network morning show back from ratings purgatory.
starring: Rachel McAdams, Harrison Ford, Diane Keaton

title: Edge of Seventeen
description: A 17-year-old confronts confusion and heartbreak as he rediscovers his sexuality in this story about coming out and its social consequences.
starring: Chris Stafford, Tina Holmes, Andersen Gabrych

title: The Babysitter: Killer Queen
description: Two years after Cole survived a satanic blood cult, he's living another nightmare: high school. And the demons from his past? Still making his life hell.
starring: Judah Lewis, Jenna Ortega, Emily Alyn Lind

title: Cargo
description: Aboard a spaceship where souls of the deceased are readied for reincarnation, a lone crew member’s rigid existence is disrupted by a spry new assistant.
starring: Vikrant Massey, Shweta Tripathi, Nandu Madhav

title: The Lost Okoroshi
description: A disillusioned security guard transforms into a masquerade, channeling ancestral spirits as he roams the streets of Lagos.
starring: Seun Ajayi, Judith Audu, Tope Tedela

title: So Much Love to Give
description: Fernando is a family man — equally committed to each of his two families. But one wrong turn brings them crashing together.
starring: Adrián Suar, Soledad Villamil, Gabriela Toscano

title: Sex Drive
description: Eager to hook up with a woman he met online, 18-year-old Ian embarks on an epic road trip that speeds straight toward trouble in this raunchy comedy.
starring: Josh Zuckerman, Amanda Crew, Clark Duke

title: Felipe Esparza: Bad Decisions
description: Two live performances, one in English and one in Spanish. No matter the language, Felipe Esparza is muy muy.
starring: Felipe Esparza

title: Magic Mike
description: Veteran male stripper Magic Mike introduces a new dancer known as the Kid to the pleasures -- and perils -- of their profession.
starring: Alex Pettyfer, Channing Tatum, Cody Horn

title: Not Another Teen Movie
description: On a bet, a gridiron hero at John Hughes High School sets out to turn a bespectacled artist into a prom queen in this outrageous parody.
starring: Chyler Leigh, Chris Evans, Jaime Pressly

title: The Wedding Planner
description: Wedding planner Mary Fiore is saved from an accident by the man of her dreams -- only to discover that he happens to be her latest client's fiancé.
starring: Jennifer Lopez, Matthew McConaughey, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras

title: The Big Wedding
description: A long-divorced couple feigns years of wedded bliss to please a special guest at their son's nuptials: his birth mother.
starring: Robert De Niro, Katherine Heigl, Diane Keaton

title: Kandasamys: The Wedding
description: With their clashing demands, the mothers of both bride and groom turn wedding prep into comical chaos in this sequel to “Keeping Up With the Kandasamys.”

title: PATRICK (2019)
description: When a schoolteacher inherits an adorable pug, she has to find a way to take care of it while dealing with her flatlining love life.
starring: Beattie Edmondson, Ed Skrein, Tom Bennett

title: Cycle
description: When his prized bicycle is stolen, an astrologer’s search turns into a journey of self-realization — while the thieves learn a few lessons of their own.
starring: Hrishikesh Joshi, Bhalchandra Kadam, Priyadarshan Jadhav

title: The Frozen Ground
description: In this fact-based thriller, an Alaska state trooper pursuing a serial killer teams with a 17-year-old-prostitute who escaped the predator's clutches.
starring: Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, Vanessa Hudgens

title: Villain
description: Fresh out of prison, an ex-con tries to save his debt-ridden brother and the family pub until local mobsters draw him back to a criminal underworld.
starring: Craig Fairbrass, George Russo, Robert Glenister

title: Unknown Origins
description: A very chiseled but somber detective must find a serial killer who leaves clues that only his mentor's nerdy comics-loving son can decipher.
starring: Javier Rey, Verónica Echegui, Brays Efe

title: Kaagar
description: When an activist begins aiding a shrewd political advisor — also his girlfriend’s father, personal agendas lead to betrayal as love and duty clash.
starring: Rinku Rajguru, Shubhankar Tawde, Shashank Shende

title: Lakeview Terrace
description: This taut thriller follows the Mattsons as they settle into their Los Angeles dream house, only to be hassled by their off-kilter neighbor.
starring: Samuel L. Jackson, Patrick Wilson, Kerry Washington

title: Son Of Adam
description: To escape conviction on criminal charges, a businessman agrees to aid a risky police mission, but his motives soon turn suspicious.
starring: Youssef El Sherif, Dina El-Sherbiny, Ahmad Rizq

title: Soldier
description: On the run from Indian police, a mysterious man escapes to Australia and falls in love with the daughter of an Indian criminal who lives there.
starring: Bobby Deol, Preity Zinta, Suresh Oberoi

title: The Social Dilemma
description: This documentary-drama hybrid explores the dangerous human impact of social networking, with tech experts sounding the alarm on their own creations.
starring: Skyler Gisondo, Kara Hayward, Vincent Kartheiser

title: My Octopus Teacher
description: A filmmaker forges an unusual friendship with an octopus living in a South African kelp forest, learning as the animal shares the mysteries of her world.

title: Making The Witcher
description: Journey into the extraordinary world of "The Witcher" — from casting the roles to Jaskier's catchy song — in this behind-the-scenes look at the series.
starring: Henry Cavill, Anya Chalotra, Freya Allan

title: Rising Phoenix
description: Elite athletes and insiders reflect on the Paralympic Games and examine how they impact a global understanding of disability, diversity and excellence.

title: Take the Ball, Pass the Ball
description: Through firsthand accounts and analysis, this football documentary details the dominance of FC Barcelona from 2008-2012 under manager Pep Guardiola.
starring: Thierry Henry, Michael Carnick, Javier Mascherano

title: Capital in the Twenty-First Century
description: Based on economist Thomas Piketty's best-selling book, this documentary examines wealth accumulation and its looming social repercussions.

title: Waiting for "Superman"
description: This dynamic documentary weaves together stories about students, educators and reformers to shed light on America's failing public school system.

title: My Own Man
description: When a man discovers he will be the father to a boy, his fear and insecurities send him on an emotional, humorous quest for his own manhood.
starring: David Sampliner

title: Sky Tour: The Movie
description: From the preparations to the performances, this documentary showcases Vietnamese pop idol Sơn Tùng M-TP and the passion behind his Sky Tour concerts.
starring: Son Tung M-TP

title: Cristina
description: In this short documentary, 37-year-old Cristina valiantly battles cancer while doing all she can to encourage others to live in the moment.

title: I'm Thinking of Ending Things
description: Nothing is as it seems when a woman experiencing misgivings about her new boyfriend joins him on a road trip to meet his parents at their remote farm.

title: Freaks – You're One of Us
description: Tipped by a mysterious tramp, a meek fry cook discovers she has superpowers — and kindred spirits — and uncovers an unsavory, widespread conspiracy.

title: Strange but True
description: A young woman rattles her former boyfriend’s family when she reveals she is pregnant with his child — despite his death five years ago.

title: Blaze
description: An influential, if unsung country songwriter reflects on his career, and how the love of his life drove him to write his most personal music.

title: Possession
description: As two guarded scholars research a secret affair between a pair of Victorian poets, they find themselves drawn in by the romance of their subjects.

title: Wildlife
description: A teen’s life in 1960 Montana grows complicated when his father is fired, his mother returns to work, and the strain on the family begins to show.

title: All Together Now
description: An optimistic, talented teen clings to a huge secret: She's homeless and living on a bus. When tragedy strikes, can she learn to accept a helping hand?

title: PhotoCopy
description: Posing as her bubbly identical twin for a quiz contest, a shy student crushes on a fellow participant, who falls for her — thinking she’s her sister.

title: Lingua Franca
description: An undocumented trans woman seeking legal status in the US becomes romantically involved with the grandson of the elderly woman she cares for.

title: The Young Messiah
description: Tormented by a demon and on the run from a Roman centurion, a 7-year-old Jesus and his parents, Mary and Joseph, flee Egypt for Nazareth.

description: A devoted nun who cares for her elder sisters must choose between upholding her vows or pursuing her forbidden feelings for a fascinating pastor.

description: A teen fresh out of juvenile detention tries to rescue her sister from foster care in order to exact revenge on their father for their mother's murder.

description: In post-revolution Tehran, a wealthy Jewish businessman is summarily jailed and tortured, but along with his wife, he fights for answers and freedom.

description: In 1950s Makassar, the life of a devoted mother is upended when another woman enters her husband's life.

title: Gie
description: Indonesian activist Soe Hok Gie experiences a political awakening during the tumultuous regimes of Suharto and Sukarno. Inspired by true events.

title: Angel Eyes
description: When a violent assault leaves her vulnerable, a streetwise Chicago cop receives help from a haunted loner who's struggling with traumas of his own.

title: The Stolen
description: A well-to-do British woman must venture into New Zealand's wild and dangerous unknown when her baby son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

description: Host Morgan Freeman explores religion's role in human history, how our beliefs connect us and possible answers to life's million-dollar questions.

title: The Curse of Oak Island
description: On an ominous island off of Nova Scotia, two brothers chase historical theories on a quest for enigmatic treasure.

title: #Alive
description: As a grisly virus rampages a city, a lone man stays locked inside his apartment, digitally cut off from seeking help and desperate to find a way out.

title: 1BR
description: Seeking her independence, a young woman moves to Los Angeles and settles into a cozy apartment complex with a disturbing sense of community.

description: A group of university students decides to test an urban legend about the ghost of a female student that haunts a campus bridge.

description: When an ex-cop becomes a superintendent of an apartment building, he suspects the sinister janitor is behind the eerie disappearances of its tenants.

description: A piece of unexploded ordnance wreaks havoc on the lives of a scrapyard worker whose truck it falls into and an anti-war activist who's hunting for it.

description: When his unlucky horoscope doesn’t bode well for his future wife, an earnest bachelor goes to surprising lengths to get the family he’s always wanted.

description: A gravity-defying boy raised in seclusion matures into an extraordinary man -- and an international celebrity -- who longs for human connection.

description: When a man falls from his balcony, an investigator questions the victim’s family, determined to uncover a darker truth behind the alleged accident.

description: High schooler Haruna befriends loner Yamada, then is drawn into the tangled relationship between him, a model and the girl who loves him unreasonably.

description: Brazilian comedian Afonso Padilha dives into his humble beginnings and digs out hilarious stories about his childhood in this very personal set.

description: A boy suddenly orphaned fights his parents' killer to save a planet, and discovers a new world of danger — and wonder.

description: In this crime docuseries spinoff, a convict is paroled 30 years after being sentenced to death for murder. Then he makes a stunning confession.

description: Aspiring interior designers transform a variety of spaces from dowdy to delightful as they vie for a life-changing contract with a top London hotel.

description: Real life mom-daughter duo Neena and Masaba Gupta play versions of themselves in this playful, fictional peek into their lives in fashion and film.

description: This mockumentary series follows the peculiar lives of six eccentric -- and sometimes obscene -- misfits who march to their own beat.

starring: Jamel Debbouze, Éric Judor, Ramzy Bedia

description: The Trailer Park Boys are thrilled to get a free trip to Europe, until they arrive and learn about their corporate sponsor's unusual requirements.

title: Sister, Sister
description: Separated at birth, twin sisters Tia Landry and Tamera Campbell reunite after 14 years and soon move in together, blending families and personalities.

title: Young Wallander
description: An incendiary hate crime stirs civil unrest, fast-tracking rookie cop Kurt Wallander to detective in this origin story for the popular character.

description: A stone's throw from Africa, the Spanish beach town of La Línea is a drug smuggling hot spot. But the police and mayor are determined to change that.

title: Lucifer
description: Bored with being the Lord of Hell, the devil relocates to Los Angeles, where he opens a nightclub and forms a connection with a homicide detective.

description: The Emmy-nominated series delves into the juicy, smoky world of barbecue, visiting acclaimed chefs and pitmasters in the US, Australia and Mexico.

starring: Park Bo-gum, Park So-dam, Byeon Woo-seok

title: The Platform
description: A programming genius builds a fact-finding, truth-seeking internet portal while reckoning with trouble at home.
starring: Maxim Khalil, Abdulmohsen Alnemr, Samr Ismaiel

title: Call My Agent!
description: At a top Paris talent firm, agents scramble to keep their star clients happy -- and their business afloat -- after an unexpected crisis.
starring: Camille Cottin, Thibault de Montalembert, Grégory Montel

title: Get Organized with The Home Edit
description: Expert home organizers Clea and Joanna help celebrities and everyday clients edit, categorize and contain their clutter to create stunning spaces.

title: Million Dollar Beach House
description: The competition is fierce — and the drama undeniable — as a group of young and hungry agents try to seal the deal on luxury listings in the Hamptons.

title: The Final Table
description: Teams of elite chefs vie to impress the world's toughest palates as they whip up iconic dishes from nine nations in this star-packed competition.
starring: Andrew Knowlton

title: Her Mother's Killer
description: Nearly 30 years after her mom's murder, a political strategist launches a calculated plan to ruin the Colombian presidential candidate who killed her.
starring: Carolina Gómez, Marlon Moreno, George Slebi

title: Street Food: Latin America
description: In this vibrant docuseries, Latin American chefs tell their stories and bring a taste of tradition and innovation to their delicious offerings.

title: Gilmore Girls
description: Fiercely independent single mom Lorelai raises gifted, Ivy League-bound daughter Rory amid a continual stream of quick-witted repartee.
starring: Lauren Graham, Alexis Bledel, Scott Patterson

title: How to Get Away With Murder
description: Brilliant criminal defense attorney and law professor Annalise Keating, plus five of her students, become involved in a twisted murder case.
starring: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Alfred Enoch
